translations: n．屁股（tush的复数形式）：非正式用语，指人的臀部。
· The kids were running around, showing their tushes.
孩子们跑来跑去，露出他们的屁股。

sentences.sentence: He was twelve years old and had lately grown rather stout, but he was still a majestic-looking pig, with a wise and benevolent appearance in spite of the fact that his tushes had never been cut.
sentences.translation: 少校已经12岁了，到现在已经长得相当健壮，不过看起来仍然很有贵族气息，它拥有一副聪明而又慈祥的外表，尽管事实上它的犬齿从来没有被剪过。
